Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Course we care.  What good's the world locked in a season of death. Frozen up, no folks to scare out of their wits on a summer's night
What?: There must be an answer somewhere.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: True... But it won't come easy or free.  If ye want to ask, ask Jenny Greenteeth.
What?: Jenny Greenteeth?  Who's she?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Someone worthy of respect, lad.  She be a water spirit, lives in a bog down at sea-side.  Hideous creature to look at, even by my doubtful standards
What?: How is it this hag knows the truth?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Think there be truth only in beauty, lad?  If you've the courage to ask and take care to avoid her terrible claws, Jenny Greenteeth has the answers you seek.
What?: Will you lead me to her?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Are we here?
What?: Aye.  That foul wallow be where Jenny Greenteeth dwells.  Oona... lure her out.  Play the part of a girl-child.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What do I do?
What?: Don't get caught, that's what! She'll suck your bones like honey- comb.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Here now.  Toss her this when you've the chance.  Jenny Greenteeth can't resist the sight of herself in a glass.  She's terribly vain.  Praise her beauty and you'll lull her sweet as a babe in a cradle.
What?: And if she thinks me a liar?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: The princess is dead.
What?: Lamentable news, Jack... but tis the fate of the living concerns us now.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Did you hear?  Twas the killing of the unicorn caused it.
What?: Aye.  Black Baron's mischief.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: If the horn be restored the curse is ended.
What?: Time for a champion.  Can you do more than pick acorns and rob bird's nests, Jack?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I'll do what I have to do, for Princess Lili's sake!
What?: Bravely spoke.  You've the heart of a champion, true enough.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Twill take more than heart.  Where do we find the armor of Achilles, for a start?
What?: I know where to find it.  Taking possession be another matter.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: There it be, lad.  The Lindfarne Mound.  Kings long forgotten lie there, lost in their final sleep.
What?: Have we turned grave-robber, then?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: A tomb it once was, boy, and a tomb it may yet be... There's another in residence at Lindfarne now.
What?: And who might that be?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: So I'm to be a dragon-slayer, is that it?
What?: Now, Jack-lad, no one's asking ye to skewer the worm.  Even St. Michael'd have a job on his hands for all that.  But the serpent hoards a pile of booty, Achilles' armor among his treasures... if we find our way within the mound and him asleep...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Better pray the worm's a sound sleeper, Jack.
What?: You do the praying.  I've work ahead.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: There's the spirit, lad.  If ye run into trouble, give a yank here and we'll haul ye up.
What?: What's left of me... How do I recognize the armor of Achilles?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: There be no finer victuals than worm flesh, lad.
What?: Better we eat him than the other way round.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: By the grace of God.
What?: No false modesty, lad.  You're a proper champion.  Achilles' armor sits on you like it was forged to fit.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I believe this is a sword such as the archangels wield.  Surely St. Michael had so fine a blade when he drove the serpent from heaven.
What?: Well then, you've got the sword and you've got the armor

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Shhhh!
What?: Screwball!  You dolt!  I've a mind to change you into a toad.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What is it?
What?: Something's coming.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Pregnant, is she?
What?: It would appear so.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Damn them!
What?: Careful, lad.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Don't see why I can't ride, too! I'm second in command, damn it!
What?: The colt's still too small.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I'm small... and I can make myself smaller still... Small as a bee! Small as dust...!  Want to see me do it?
What?: We've no time for tricks this day, Honeythorn Gump.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Tricks, is it?  Why I'll trick ye! Ungrateful whelp!  I'll sour your milk and bird droppings'll fall from the sky wherever ye walk.
What?: Save your mischief for the Black Baron.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Aye!  That too.
What?: You'll need more than bird droppings for Blackheart.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I'll drop a cow on the knave!
What?: Drop a mountain on him and we won't need our troops.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Fine-looking army.
What?: We march on Castle Couer de Noir within the hour.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: How do you plan on finding this here castle, if ye don't mind me asking?
What?: A true and troubling question, Gump... We'll start from where the unicorn was killed.  The Baron must have left a trail.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Track the demon to his lair.
What?: Aye.  And hang his foul hide up like dirty laundry for the drying.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: We must follow that bird.
What?: Whatever for?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Jenny Greenteeth said:  "Follow the raven in her flight..."
What?: Aye.  Said to follow it to the edge of night.  But is this the right bird?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I'm sure.  It spoke to me.
What?: Birds speak to me all the time. What did it say?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Beware.
What?: Sounds like the bird we want.  All right lads, follow yon raven!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: How do we follow a raven we can't even see?
What?: Send Oona up above the tree tops. She be our eyes.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: This is ogre's magic.
What?: Blackheart?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Aye.  He's enchanted the lot of them.  His reward for delivering the unicorn.
What?: Foul fellow, this Couer de Noir.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: The foulest.  Mayhap I can cut them free.
What?: Jack, don't!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Worse than the battlefield.
What?: What know you of fields of war?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: There... it seems to quit... I'll wager that war held other attractions quite apart from nursing.
What?: Well... if the knight be already dead

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Oona tells me the raven has roosted for the night on a sharp stone spire some half a mile distance.
What?: That would be Devil's Needle.  Last landmark I know in these woods.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Good.
What?: Beyond Devil's Needle, all is unknown.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Twould appear other travelers precede us.
What?: Nay, Jack, tis not what you're thinking.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I trust our own welcome will be more hospitable.
What?: Jack, Jack, it's dwarves live here. Hard-working chaps.  Hammering in the forge all the live-long day. Make the most wondrous things, they do.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: And this?  Some of their handiwork?
What?: Nay.  That's but to distract the casual visitor.  A dwarf is too busy to suffer fools gladly.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Better to kill than be disturbed.
What?: Your imagination runs away with you, Jack... Those bones be but battlefield gleanings, like I mentioned.  A wee bit of carrion to frighten off the uninvited.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Nice piece of work.
What?: Pure gold it is... plays a different note every time.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: My God!  Look!
What?: Something the matter?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Shhh!  Not so loud, mayhap he'll hear ye.
What?: Dwarves be very sensitive about their feet.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Certainly understandable.
What?: Very secretive, they are.  Keep their feet covered up.  Best if you don't mention it.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I should hope not!
What?: Gump, you're putting words in my mouth.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I pray always to be worthy of it.
What?: Stoutly spoke, lad.  These dwarves be sore grouches... Pay no heed to their spiteful grumbling.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Don't let this talk of heroes upset you, Jack.  Sigurd's sword is no great thing.  The Volsung killed Fafnir.  You killed Lindfarne. That's one worm apiece... I'd say you and Sigurd were neck-and-neck.
What?: We're not in a tournament, Gump.  Ah, but a sword twice tempered in the blood of living dragons...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Tis not the sword that counts, but the man what swings it.  Rest easy, Jack.
What?: God protect you, Honeythorn Gump.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Make haste!  We've a hard day's march ahead.
What?: Be gentle with them, Jack.  They only march to please you.  Were this a faerie journey, we'd ride the wind on thistledown and ragwort stems.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: ... this rate... we'll all be in our graves... 'fore we reach the Baron's fortress...
What?: We'll surely be in our graves if we don't.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: God's blessing.
What?: There's the way, mates.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What make ye of that, Jack?
What?: It bodes evil.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Wait!
What?: Willful creature, that one...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Archers!  Bring down that spider! I'll deal with this other creature...
What?: Stay on your guard, Jack.  The bug is enchanted surely.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Is she... dead?
What?: No, thank the Lord, but she be sore envenomed by the spider's bite.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: We're blind now.  Oona was our eyes and ears.  How do we find the Castle Couer de Noir without her?
What?: We'll find it.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Easily said... the raven passed this way hours ago.
What?: Heading true north.  We continue in that direction.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Never knowing when it takes a turn or changes course.
What?: We'll trust in faith, Gump.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Why not admit it, Honeythorn Gump. We've lost our way entirely.
What?: Long as we don't lose heart, Jack...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: We'll never find the Baron's castle.
What?: Once you thought we'd never find the Greek's armor and look at ye now, decked out like a proper hero.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Wait, Jack.
What?: Nay.  This time we strike first!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Hold, Jack!  Don't strike!
What?: Nay.  I show no pity to imps and fiends.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Aye.  We be on a quest to set the world aright --
What?: But seem to have gotten lost on the way.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Can we trust him?
What?: No... but what choice have we?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Never felt so cold in all me born days...
What?: The chill is worse this night.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Don't like the feel of it, Jack.
What?: It's your own fear troubles you... We're here, aren't we?  For all the dark magic protecting it.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Give in to despair and all is lost.
What?: It feels wrong, Jack... like a trap.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: There's more than one way to spring a trap.
What?: Aye, so long as you're not too greedy for the bait.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: That be so, better you pinch yourself now, Jack.
What?: On the morrow I'll be awake enough to see if dreams come true.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Tells you something 'bout him what lives there...
What?: We'll need more siege machinery and longer scaling ladders.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Why not mine the damned walls?
What?: We do both.  Our frontal attack a diversion whilst we drive a tunnel under...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: A fine mess this is... horrid, nipping creatures... What do we now, Jack?
What?: Defend ourselves.  We've bested far worse already.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Easily spoken...
What?: Don't loose heart... Assemble the archers.  Have everyone not holding a shield man a bow.  Shoot the damned things as they fly.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: There aren't enough arrows.
What?: Never mind.  Just do it!  Retrieve the arrows somehow.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Water doesn't burn...
What?: And frog don't fly and bite like tomcats.  It be magic, Jack... powerful ogre's magic.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: There isn't much time!
What?: Been telling you that all along, lad.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What magic have we on our side?
What?: Faerie magic's no match for a sorcerer's power... We have Ogg's gifts, the key and the --

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: That's it!  The unbreakable line! We'll tie it to an arrow and fire it up into the timbers above the portculis... then, I'll climb up and chop down the drawbridge.
What?: Will you chance a miss?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: One more turn...
What?: That's it!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Have the engineers corrected for alignment and trajectory?
What?: Aye.  Before the wee pesties attacked.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Then it's Godspeed, Screwball.
What?: Fire away!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: He'll be atop the portculis ere long.
What?: Best get down close to the moat, lad.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Aye.  We're good as inside.
What?: It's what we'll find there worries me.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Jack!  The courtyard's been taken... The Baron's forces are besieged in the south tower.  No sign of... Jack?  Do you hear what I'm saying? We've won, lad.
What?: It doesn't matter.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Nonsense!  Course it matters.
What?: ... the Princess Lili... I've killed her.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: She's sore hurt, Jack, tis true, but not dead yet.
What?: The wound is mortal.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Nay.  You've not reckoned with the powers of faerie medicine.
What?: Can you save her?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Easily... The question is, can we save ourselves?  Be a shame to win the battle only to lose the war.
What?: I don't... understand.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: The Baron hides in the dark in a passage under the Castle... Quick, give me the dwarf's key... the one which opens any lock...
What?: In the dark, lad?  Why should he do that?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Because sunlight will kill him. Quickly now, give me the key.
What?: Sunlight, you say?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Aye.  Hurry now, Gump, the key!
What?: Mean you to seek him out below?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I'm not afraid of the dark.
What?: I admire your valor, Jack.  By all means, seek him out... But first, we needs visit the kitchen.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: The kitchen be the most important room in a palace, for if the victuals ain't right, little else is likely to be so.
What?: Did you bring me here to sup?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Nay, lad, we're here to collect a weapon you'll need fighting the Baron.
What?: What weapon?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Sunlight.
What?: Plan on carrying some away in a kettle?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Will you explain what's going on?
What?: Patience, lad.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Hey!  Stop it!  I can't see.
What?: Ah, but you will.  And so will the Baron, when we bring a little light to his dark hideaway.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Can't we move any faster?
What?: Tis a delicate operation, lad. Requires a bit of engineering... Next!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Seems to be some sort of vaulted chamber up ahead...
What?: Don't get too far!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: He's getting away!  He was at my mercy!
What?: Never show mercy!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Ever wondered why Jenny Greenteeth said you needed the fastest steed on earth?
What?: Sapphire!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Ride like wild fire, Jack.
What?: He'll not escape me.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: A good day for singing...
What?: I've not heard a note out of you.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Not in the mood, I'm afraid.
What?: Listen to him.  Not in the mood...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: On a day like none other the blessed earth has ever seen... A day so fair as forty springtimes --
What?: I'm not denying it's a joyous day --

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Where's your joy if you cannot sing?
What?: Were the Princess Lili to join me I would sing till my lungs burst!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: She lives... isn't that worth singing about?
What?: She lives like all the world before the Baron's curse lifted.  Now the world's reborn, yet still she sleeps...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: The quest's at an end and where's the good of it?  A faerie festival over a pile of bones?
What?: Tis not the wound, that's sure.  Not a scar remains... we're talking about a spell

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I'll do anything... face any challenge!
What?: Might not need a gesture quite so grand.  What were you doing the very moment the Baron's curse fell on the world?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I was with the Princess.
What?: Where?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: By the pond.  She was teasing me.
What?: Go on... go on...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: She tossed her ring in the pond and bid me fetch it.  Said she'd marry me if I did.
What?: And did you?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Nay.  It was lost.  When I came up for air the pond was frozen over.
What?: That's it then... the ring!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You must find the ring... It completes the cycle
What?: I'll try.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Keep me belly full, Jack.  Kill us another worm.
What?: Hush up, Screwball.  Do your own worm-sticking if you like the taste so well.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Well done, lad.  Stout heart.
What?: Wolf-slayer, worm-sticker... give a cheer for the champion!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Barely living, from the looks of it.
What?: No, no, no... this is different!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You see!  You see!
What?: These chaps'll need a woodpecker to pick their teeth.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Ogg lives there...!  And Thurgis!
What?: Screwball!  Be quiet...!  We have friends live 'neath the Needle. They'll no doubt provide safe refuge for the night.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: We seek to undo the curse.
What?: Gonna make ogre-stew!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Well done, lad.
What?: Three cheers for our champion.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Look at that shot!  Three at once! I can't miss!
What?: Very thrifty.  Even got your arrow back.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Sweet slippers of Oisin!
What?: They've fired the moat!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Someone like Floki... or Squarefoot... or --
What?: You'll do it because I am you liege and I command you to do it!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Aye... my Lord...
What?: Rise, Screwball, and into the basket with you.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Start acting like you're worthy of this mission... Here.  Whatever you do, don't dare drop it.
What?: Nay, Sire, I'll cling to it as to life itself...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: How're these?
What?: They'll do nicely.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Dolt!
What?: Sorry.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Greetings, my lady, the green wood is honored.
What?: Oh, Jack, you are a wild man to use me so.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: These for me?
What?: If you like.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You promised!
What?: Never.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: But you did... you did!
What?: I may have said perhaps...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Liar!
What?: Or perchance...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: It's my father, gone a-hunting.  The Baron Couer de Noir is his guest and must be provided with some sport.
What?: Sport, indeed.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: The Baron is a frightful man.  They say he's an ogre.  He wears a mask so none may see his face.
What?: Blackheart.  Aptly named.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Oh, fie.  What about the unicorn?
What?: Unicorn?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: A promise is a sacred oath.
What?: All right.  I'll show you something sacred.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Let's rest a minute.  I'm so thirsty.
What?: Stop complaining.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: A gentleman would offer water.
What?: Only were he a fool to boot.  See yon viper?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I detest serpents.
What?: That viper has envenomed the water. No animal will drink here now.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What shall we do?
What?: Be patient.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Oh, dear.
What?: What's the matter?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I've lost my napkin.  It was all elf-work and lace... I must have dropped it when you startled me so.
What?: I'll go search for it.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Don't leave me now.  I fear the unicorn won't show himself without you.
What?: I'm not its master.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: The napkin will keep.  I'd rather not be alone.
What?: Your command is my wish, Princess Lili.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: How much longer?
What?: Shhh!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I am a princess.  You have no right to order me about.
What?: In these woods you are a commoner. Now be quiet.  True royalty approaches.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Such grace... and their smell
What?: They rival the angels of paradise.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Oh Jack, mightn't I touch one?  It would thrill me so.
What?: Are you honest?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Jack!
What?: Tis a fair question.  If you be a virtuous maid the unicorn will lay his head in your lap.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: He'll not flee if I show myself?
What?: Not if you be chaste.  Tis an awesome test of virginity.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I've no fear of failure.  Your implications are most unbecoming.
What?: I'm not your judge... nor have I any desire to witness the trial.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Where are you going?
What?: To fetch your napkin.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What happened?
What?: I don't know.  They've hurt the unicorn.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Who?
What?: My father and the Baron.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Damned hunters.  It was a trap, and you were the bait!
What?: I didn't know... I didn't...  It was so lovely... he was in my lap like... like a baby... and... I...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: They tricked you.
What?: My own father...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: How bad was the unicorn's wound?
What?: It happened so fast.  He was hurt and ran away.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: He did run?
What?: Oh, yes, and the mare with him.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: There are many would pay a king's ransom for a few drops of unicorn blood.
What?: I don't want it on me.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Its powers are strong.
What?: I don't want to be reminded of what happened.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Not even the birds sing sweet as you.
What?: Jack... Green Jack, you mustn't flatter me so.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Tis the truth.
What?: A maid must beware of flattery... Methinks you want to kiss me.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: There's no happier thought under heaven.
What?: If I were your bride, would the kissing ever stop...?  Do you wish to marry me, Jack?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: My lady mocks me.
What?: Nay, Jack, I'm but wary of your intentions.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: My heart intends no more than that you love me as I do you.
What?: Oh, la...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I'm afraid it may storm.
What?: Let it.  Haven't you a cozy bower we might hide in?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Tis not fit for a princess.
What?: Be it fit for your wife, Green Jack?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I have no wife.
What?: Then, perchance you'll me.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: If wishes were horses even beggars would ride.
What?: Do you wish it, Jack?  Wish you this our wedding band?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Lili!  No!
What?: Jack... Forgive me...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What have I done?
What?: Only what's right...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I thought you were dead... I --
What?: I was bewitched... it's better this way...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: No!  I won't let it happen...
What?: You've freed me, Jack...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: It's the Baron's damnable work!  Too cowardly to stand and fight... he used you to save himself.
What?: No... it's not you he's afraid of, it's... light...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What?
What?: Sunlight... It destroys him.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Sunlight?
What?: That's why he goes masked during the day...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: So, he's hiding in the dark...
What?: In the dark... where I join him...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: No!  Don't let go... you mustn't!  I love you!
What?: And I... love you...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Oh!  Green Jack!  What a dream I've had... proper nightmare.
What?: Whilst you were sleeping, I fetched your ring.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Sweet Jack.  I'm so sorry you found me asleep.  Don't know what came over me.
What?: I can't have been under much more than a minute.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Seemed like weeks and weeks.  Such a terrible dream... I could never tell you...
What?: Is what you said about the ring but another dream?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Oh no, dearest Jack... I meant every word.
What?: You're teasing still.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Nay, dearest Jack... you are to be my husband.  I want none other.
What?: But... I am a Green Man.  I have no title, nor lands... scarce even a few vines and threads to keep the cold from my body.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You wear your weeds as well as golden armor, Jack.  Like a true Prince... a champion!
What?: Lili... I love you!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What's the matter?
What?: Ouch!  Something's biting me.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Biting you?
What?: Pinching me!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Pinching?  Where?
What?: Everywhere!  Ow!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I can't see a thing.
What?: Nor can I.  Damn!  It's buzzing all around me.  Ouch!  I can hear it like a fly trapped inside my ear... Says its name is Oona!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Oona?  Do you suppose it's a faerie?
What?: Ow!  Whatever it is, it hurts.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Honored to make your acquaintance.
What?: Grand champion, is it?  And what great cause leads you to me?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: We seek the ogre, Baron Couer de Noir.  He slew a unicorn and plunged the world into eternal winter.
What?: Thought the weather terrible of late.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Step lively now!
What?: His feet shall never cross my lips.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Sigurd's sword...
What?: Another hero's hand-me-down... Thurgis, note the armor

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What's this now?
What?: I bring you the only treasure worthy of your loveliness... for naught else in the universe rivals the reflected glory of your beauty.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Well spoke, boy.  You have discerning taste for one so young... Just who might you be?
What?: They call me Green Jack, ma'am.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Come closer then, Jack, that I might give you proper thanks.
What?: Your fair smile be thanks enough. Better I stand afar to admire your beauty complete.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Think me fair, do you, Jack?
What?: The moon herself would hide behind a cloud rather than dare comparison with you...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: The moon is too round of face, methinks.
What?: The sight of you makes flowers seem like dross.  All the heavenly angels must envy your grace.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I like well your conceit, Jack.  Tis rare to find an honest lad in this troubled world.
What?: Aye.  And it is the trouble befallen us that brings me here.  I entreat you to tell me the cause of our surrounding sorrow, most lovely of the lovely.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Dear lad, what does winter bespeak but death?  It is a time of mourning.  This calamity is a curse. Something wondrous and beautiful has been taken from the world.
What?: A unicorn's been slain.  The last stallion in all the country.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Here be the death weapon
What?: Couer de Noir!  A demon if the Devil ever made one.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: He chopped off the horn and left the rest to rot.
What?: That would be the Baron's way. There'll be no light or life in the world until the alicorn is taken from him and he vanquished.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: How do I get the horn back?
What?: You'll need the fastest steed alive, for Couer de Noir's castle rests at the very edge of the earth.  Only the sharpest sword and the golden armor of Achilles will protect you from his fury.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Where do I find the Baron's castle?
What?: Follow the raven in her flight, Follow old black wing to the edge of night...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Not very precise directions.
What?: Come sit beside me, sweet boy, and I'll draw you a map.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Nay.  Tempting as your invitation be.  Tell me one thing more.
What?: Ask away, sweet man.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What became of the princess?
What?: Princess?  I know of no princess.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Princess Lili, Godwin's daughter. She was with me when calamity struck, but after I could find no trace of her.
What?: Is she fair, this princess?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Exceeding fair.
What?: As fair as me?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Twould be to compare one star with another in the summer sky.
What?: She's dead!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: No!
What?: Dead, dead, dead.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I don't believe you.
What?: Far as you're concerned she's dead, believe it or not.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: This is sad news, be it true.
What?: Don't be sad, Jack, not with me here to give you cheer.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Tis not the time to speak of cheer.
What?: You'll visit again?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: As a hummingbird returns to the fairest blossom.
What?: What a fine meal you'd make, be the rest of you sweet as your tongue.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Courage, Jack.
What?: I pray God grants it me.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: This is not the time for squabbling.
What?: Sorry.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Were I a mortal girl, Jack, methinks I'd be in love with you.
What?: Then I'd kiss you without turning my garments inside-out and sewing bells all over.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Such a sad world, be there no unicorns to brighten it.
What?: No fear of that now.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Never even had a sword in my hand until yesterday.
What?: Then, tis not for chastity? Methought you kept a naked blade twixt you and any maiden chanced spend the night.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I live in an abandoned fox den neath the roots of a thousand-year-old oak.  My bed is pine boughs and rabbit skins.  There's no need of weaponry to keep the maids away.
What?: I'm partial to oaks, as are all faerie folk.  Mayn't I come visit sometime?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I'd be honored.
What?: Only that?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: And charmed, of course.
What?: Fie!  Don't speak of charms.  I should charm you for being so dull- witted.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I had no thought of offending you, Oona.
What?: Do I not please you, Jack?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: In every way.
What?: And am I not fair?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Wondrously so.
What?: Then why do you speak sweeter words to Jenny Greenteeth?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: That was in jest.
What?: Jest with me then.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: How so?
What?: Tell me I'm fair, as you did the hag.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You are fair as the first new flower of spring...
What?: And sweet?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Sweeter than bee pollen on a summer wind.
What?: Pray you be sweet as your words, dear Jack.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Nay, Oona, tis not possible.
What?: A faerie's love makes anything possible.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I'm promised to another!
What?: What shape I take matters not.  Long you for another?  I'll give you your heart's desire.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Oona... don't cry... please, you mustn't...
What?: You... you... you mortal you!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Please...
What?: Why should I feel such pain?  Should be the other way round... I could vex you... make you dance your life away...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What care I for the human heart! Such a soft, spiritless thing it is. I prefer the hearts of hawks and wolves
What?: And as barren of love as stone.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I would build a wall around me with such stone, so the likes of you might never enter.
What?: Be fair, Oona.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Is this a May Day pageant?  Are you all off on a lark...?  The raven passed this way hours ago!
What?: Heading north still?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: The fastest in the world.
What?: I know where to find him... He lies out on the marsh, raven-fodder

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What do we do now?
What?: We wait.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What's she doing?
What?: I think she's about to foal.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I'm in your debt, Screwball.
What?: Watch behind or I'll never collect on it!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Praise be to God.
What?: Small miracles better than no miracles...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Master Jack!  Master Jack!  These woods are alive!  They're alive!
What?: Of course they're alive.  All nature is living.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Where?
What?: Up ahead!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What can you steal from a man already lost his life?
What?: His honor, I suppose... seeing he no longer can defend it.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What care the bones when the soul is free?
What?: Bah!  You faeries have the morals of ferrets.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Maybe there's a better idea... What about birds... get a lift from some friendly bird...
What?: Haven't heard a bird sing in days...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Hello, Jack.
What?: Done like a champion.  Can you reach me with the line?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Sorry, Jack.
What?: It's done... we'll never catch him.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Your fond wishes give me strength, dear friends.
What?: No speeches!  What's a little swim after sticking worms and ogres?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Each fit for a hero... My uncle fashioned a hammer for Thor.  Twas he named it Mjolnir.  Grandfather forged Excalibur... You won't ever see finer craftsmanship.
What?: Oh, but I have.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: How came you by this blade?
What?: I slew the Lindfarne Worm with it.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: The Avatar.  I like the sound of it.
What?: Sigurd the Volsung slew Fafnir with that blade... See the line where Regin welded the break?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Uhm... fine work.
What?: Achilles wore it before the gates of Troy.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You're with us in battle.
What?: May God protect you.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: No hurt Jimmy, sir... oh no, please, sir...
What?: I'm sending you back to Hell!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Is he a friend, then?
What?: Yes, yes... Jimmy Squarefoot good friend to one and all...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Forgive my blood haste, Jimmy Squarefoot, but I want no more surprises from Couer de Noir.
What?: The Black Baron, you say?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Lost?
What?: Much good we do the world, for all our noble quest...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Simple as that, eh?
What?: Castle Couer de Noir built with magic... simple as death... strong as hate...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Can you show us the way?
What?: To Castle Couer de Noir?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: There'll be spoils aplenty if you guide us there.  Once we breach the walls, help yourself to all you can carry.
What?: That very nice.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Let that be our problem, just get us there.
What?: You follow.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: It be the castle... we feel the castle... it be that close...
What?: A castle's but stone and mortar --

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Plenty treasure inside... Jimmy seen it once.
What?: You've been inside?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: In a dream.
What?: Don't speak to me of dreams!  I feel I've been dreaming since the unicorn was killed.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: ADRIAN!
What?: You shouldn't have come here.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Adrian, you gotta come back to Hell. Dad's sick.
What?: He's sick?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: He should have thought of that before he denied me my birthright.
What?: Well maybe you should go back and talk it over with him.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Of course I can. Drink or she dies.  Unlike you, she won't come back from where she's going.
What?: Let her go.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Welcome to the party. It's so nice to see all of you here.
What?: Hey, that's Dad's throne! How did Adrian get that? Is Dad okay?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Little Nicky.
What?: Adrian, I'm asking you nicely, in the name of all that is good: release my friends and get in the flask.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Is this a joke?
What?: No. It's the inner light. And with it we can defeat anything you've got.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Now will you get in the flask?
What?: Absolutely not.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I knew it. He's finally retiring.
What?: I've been waiting on this day for ten thousand years.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You work your ass off for ten thousand years, hurting people, helping others hurt people, then you get a decision like that.
What?: And he's dead serious.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Um, excuse me, we're having a private conversation here.
What?: Yeah, get out of here! Beat it!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: That's what I thought!
What?: Could you concentrate for five seconds?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I am concentrating. Where can we rule?
What?: What do you think about... Earth?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: We could create our own hell there.
What?: You saying we go up there and kill everyone?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Eventually, Cassius. But first we corrupt as many as we can so that when we do destroy them...
What?: ...their damned souls will be ours.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: "Let the sin begins" -- that was a good one.
What?: Well, we must get people sinning if we want to fill up our New Hell. How are things going down at City Hall?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I lowered the drinking age to ten.
What?: Brilliant. This is so much fun. I never want it to end.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Hello, Cassius.
What?: All right. Let me out.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You know, New Hell really only needs one new Satan.
What?: You mother...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Thank you, Nicky. Cause now I'm gonna bust Adrian's head wide open.
What?: I was going to let you out, eventually, Cassius. I swear.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: No!
What?: Don't do it!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Ta-da. So what time is my brother expected back?
What?: Noon...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: But what about the cash? Can we keep it or what?
What?: Sure, why not?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: It is awfully hot down here. How do you manage to stay so cool?
What?: Weed lowers the body temperature.  I read that... in, uh... er, science magazine.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: And give you a good buzz.
What?: Or maybe it will trap me inside for all eternity.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Oh, Nicky, I've missed you. Come on out and say hello...
What?: Urr... uggg... errr...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Keep it up and I just might make you my Queen for a night or two.
What?: You want a queen? Got one right here.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Oh. My. God. I can't believe you're here. Welcome. Can I just tell you, I am so excited right now.
What?: So excited.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I remember that night, you had like four daiquiris.
What?: Try four and a half. At first I totally didn't like him.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I'll call her later.
What?: You know, we saw you save your girlfriend's life.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: All these good people have totally been led astray.
What?: Show him Central Park.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: She goes to Parson's, right?
What?: I would totally love to go there. But I hear it's really hard to get in.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: The home of eternal damnation, house of Hades, H.E. double toothpicks...
What?: Maybe try the opposite of that.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Okay, can I just ask you something? What do you know about your mom?
What?: My brothers told me my mother was a mountain goat. Which would explain my chronic halitosis.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: A mountain goat? That's really sweet.
What?: My mom wasn't a goat?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Try an angel.
What?: An angel?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Wow. What... what did she look like?
What?: Well, she was about six-three, only spoke Portuguese and had really long grey hair.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: How come you're not older?
What?: Angels don't get any older, son.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Where did you meet my father?
What?: It was a long time ago, at some Heaven and Hell mixer.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Hello... yes, he's here with me now... I don't know if he's hot, he's my son, you perv! I'll call you back...  Oh my God, I will call you back, goodbye.  That was my friend, Michelle, she says "hi."
What?: Well tell her I said "hi" back.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: How did you see me?
What?: We can see what's going on anywhere on Earth. Look.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Valerie's crying!
What?: She's so nice.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I gotta help her. I gotta help Dad. I gotta help everybody.
What?: Yeah, you do...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: But how can I win? Adrian is stronger and smarter than me.
What?: Stronger, yes. Smarter, definitely. But you have something he doesn't have.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What is it?
What?: I'm not a hundred percent on that. God said when the time comes, you'll know what to do.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Well, nice meeting you, Jenna, Christa.  Would it be okay if I called you Mommy?
What?: It would be so okay.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Well, Mommy, get me to the big apple cause I'm gonna rock that town like a hurricane.
What?: You're already there...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What's Nicky doing down there?
What?: Trying to capture his brother in a flask and preserve the balance of good and evil on Earth.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Did you just talk?
What?: No.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Where is he? He's late.
What?: He'll be here. Just keep your cool, kid.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: They castrated him. He can't shoot arrows, he can't piss smoke.
What?: I can't screw.  I can't screw.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Oh my God, he just opened his mouth and swallowed that spit.
What?: That turn you on there, RuPaul?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: My name's Beefy. I'm an old friend of your father's. He's asked me to help you out.
What?: I just need to find my brothers and be on my way, Beefy.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Okay, "bro," this jig is up...  Just get in the bottle. Just slide right on in there.
What?: It's not me, moron.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Makin' friends already.
What?: It's freezing up here, Beefy.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You're on Earth now, kid. Gonna have the same physical needs and limitations a human has. We'll stop by K-mart. Get you some warm clothes.
What?: I also have this odd pain in my mid section. Kind of a hollow feeling...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: So far, so good. Now what?
What?: Put it in your mouth.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Hey... Popeye's chicken is ass kickin'!
What?: It sure is. Now eat it up. You're gonna need your energy.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: From now on. I'm just going to avoid all moving metal objects.
What?: Great. Now your father gave me some deposit money for a nice pad on the Upper East Side. But I misplaced it.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You'll be alright. Go on. Big day tomorrow. Don't forget to do that sleep thing I told you about.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: We find, in the Valley, it makes for better happiness among the natives. Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Oh, good heavens, no!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Why, we have no crime here. What makes a criminal?  Lack, usually. Avariciousness, envy, the desire to possess something owned by another. There can be no crime where there is a sufficiency of everything.

Here, however, in Shangri- La, by our standards your life has just begun, and may go on and on.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Uh huh. And?
What?: Well, I have to get a message to her. I have to let her know I'm <u>okay</u>. Until I can get out of here...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Kid - didn't they tell you about this party?
What?: Tell me what?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: It's a special kind of party. A <u>farewell</u> party. Do you...get what I'm saying?
What?: Farewell? You mean - you mean I'm -

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I think I...I'm about to... Am I mistaken, or don't I get to... Is there some...
What?: Y'see, Stu, as I understand it, you made this pact with your sister...no life support?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Besides, Julie wouldn't...she'd never...
What?: Actually, Stu, Julie doesn't get to decide. That's why she was having the nightmare. They're pulling the plug at nine AM.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Stu, I like you personally, I admire your work, but I'm just the God of Sleep. This is Death's bailiwick.
What?: Maybe you could talk to Death!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Now Death is not what you would call a people person, like me. Death is a <u>putz</u> - and I should know. I'm his little brother.
What?: You're Death's <u>brother</u>?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Guys, I don't mean to be rude, but I only have eleven hours and fifty-three minutes to...
What?: Oh, right. Cheating Death. There's <u>one thing</u> you might try. Only one guy in <u>history</u> ever pulled it off. Well, actually two. Actually, no, there was that other guy who...well, <u>very few people</u> have done it.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Land of Death. How do I get there?
What?: Kid, listen: <u>that's all I'm saying</u>. And you didn't hear it from me.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: NO! DON'T YOU UNDERSTAND?? HE'S GOT MY E-TICKET! HE'S GOT MY -
What?: Sorry, Stu. It's all part of the deal. We've got <u>big plans</u> for that body of yours!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Sorry, Steve, maybe next time. And how's our new guest settling in - ?
What?: YOU SET ME UP!!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Easy, pal! I was coming to congratulate you. It ain't easy snatching one of those E-tickets. Steve here was the last guy to pull it off, and that musta been, what, 25 years ago...?
What?: Why'd you do it? What'd I ever do to you?!?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: It's simple, Stu. We need nightmares - lots of 'em. So whenever we can swing it, we send a guy up to stimulate the flow...a <u>nightmare maker</u>! Like Steve here. Poe. Rasputin...we've been doing this all the way back to Atilla and Genghis Khan!
What?: But <u>why me</u>? Why'd you pick on <u>me</u>??

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: The monkey, of course. It was his idea.
What?: Monkeybone...!?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Nobody wants to be a sidekick, Stu. So one day he comes to us - he's got a proposition. We help him get your body...in return he gives us all the nightmares we want.
What?: You're nuts! I'm a comic strip artist! What's he gonna do - draw <u>really scary cartoons</u>??

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Oh, baby, I can't believe you're back.
What?: Home sweet home, huh? Actually, I was expecting something a little swankier. How much loot does old Stu rake in, anyway?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Meaning me, of course. I'm referring to myself. You have to assume Monkeybone would be a pretty lucrative franchise...
What?: Baby? Why don't you just...rest on the sofa for a minute. I'll be right back.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Bitchin' good cake.
What?: Stu, are you...feeling okay?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Sure. Why?
What?: You're acting kind of...odd.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What are you watching?
What?: Ohhh, nothing.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You sure this is...medically advisable?
What?: Got a doctor on duty.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Priceless! Priceless! This stuff just <u>kills</u> me!
What?: I'm heading in to work, baby. Are you sure you'll be okay?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Oh yeah. There's just one thing I don't get. "Monkeybone Creator Awakens from Coma" that's a big story! That's front page news! But I can't find a word of coverage in this stinkin' rag! Hey. Don't I have a TV show?
What?: They only made the one episode. They've shown it about nineteen times.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: And speaking of which, here's the light of my life, the pert and saucy Miss Julie McElroy.
What?: I had to park two blocks away. Is something -

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What's this about merchandising? You always hated merchandising!
What?: Well, baby, I do, but to look at it from another angle...there's a <u>potload</u> of money here.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Stu? Is that you? Where did you <u>go</u>?
What?: Me? Nowhere. I was asleep.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Baby, don't lie. I know you went out.
What?: Not me. Nope. You must've been dreaming.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You're wearing a <u>topcoat</u>, Stu. - Where are your pants?
What?: <u>Well</u>, Miss Smarty, if I didn't go out, I wouldn't <u>need</u> any pants. Now would I?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: We'll hop a plane tonight. An island ceremony. An Abba Dabba honeymoon!
What?: It looks so...<u>new</u>.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: It is new. Why wouldn't it be new?
What?: But the heirloom ring. Your grandmother's ring...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Boy, the nuts are out tonight. What'd that creep call you - ?
What?: He called me "Doc."

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You want to leave? But Stu - you're a big hit! Everyone loves you!
What?: They don't love me. They love Monkeybone.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: It was you who got the standing O. It was you drawing on the belly over there...
What?: That was especially Monkeybone. Come on, Doc, I don't want to be stuck here with this bunch of media creeps. I just want to be us. Home. Alone! I have something I have to give you.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Can't you give it to me later?
What?: Yeah, I <u>could</u>, but the thing is, if later got here sooner, it would be...better.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Look at this! He won't let us leave!
What?: Who?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: The monkey!! He's everywhere! He'll take over both our lives if we let him.
What?: Stu - stop it. That monkey is <u>good luck</u>. You thought him up, and everybody loves him, and he's probably going to make you rich. So relax! Enjoy it!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I'm trying. It's weird, that's all. I never had any good luck, until I met you...what if it's all just another bad dream?
What?: What's the "bad" part?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I might wake up.
What?: If you do, I'll be right there beside you. So face it. You're just going to have to be happy!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Did we just - <u>hit</u> something?
What?: I don't think so.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I'm fine, baby. We're all okay. We were lucky.
What?: I'd better go report this...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Stu?
What?: Julie?... Hey, you <u>are</u> a looker.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: How was it? I don't recall.
What?: It was great, baby. Let's get you to the ER.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Oh, Stu. Tell me I'm not dreaming.
What?: Baby...you're asking the wrong guy.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What's the matter?
What?: My <u>tail</u> itches.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Oh, Julie...my poor Stu...my poor baby brother...
What?: When'd you get in?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: An hour ago. I tried to prepare myself, but I didn't know he would be like, like this. I can't even bear to look at him... How about you? You're okay?
What?: I'm fine, Kimmy. Fine.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I had so much I always wanted to say to him. At least he had a chance to give you the ring.
What?: The ring...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Kimmy, he doesn't know what's going on. He doesn't even know he's in a -
What?: Please, Julie. This is not easy for me. Our father took a <u>long</u> time to die. A long time. It just about killed us all. And Stu and I made a pact that when our time came - we wouldn't let it drag out.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: It's too soon even to - <u>talk</u> about that!
What?: Give me a date, Doctor.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Kimmy! What's the matter?
What?: This is hard for me, Julie...very hard...but it's been three months now, and... I gave the order.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Nothing for him! He's being repressed.
What?: Is something wrong, Stu? You seem so tense.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Hypnos?
What?: Yeah. To see if he could expedite my case. But I wait, and I wait, and...I'm starting to think I'll never see her again.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I'm so sorry, Stu. I <u>wanted</u> to tell you what was going on. I really, really liked you.
What?: Kitty...<u>my</u> situation is really not important. The thing is, my girlfriend is now living with, and possibly engaged to, a demented monkey.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You're such a beautiful man. Look at you - stuck in this place, and only thinking of her.
What?: Listen to me! Is there any way I can <u>warn</u> her what Monkeybone is up to??

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Don't ask where I got it.
What?: You can't do this! You'll get in trouble!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You're the only true-hearted man I ever met. You find a way back to that girl of yours and make her happy.
What?: How am I gonna get past the guards?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Go. Just <u>go</u>.
What?: Thanks, Kitty, I'll never forget you for th--

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: <u>You</u> have humiliated me in public for the <u>last</u> <u>time</u>.
What?: I doubt that. Besides, I can't help myself. I'm just a figment of your imagination.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Then you can learn to act normally. I had to!
What?: Aw, come on. You know you love me. You're a masochistic pain freak. You <u>gotta</u> love me.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You are too! Mooning over Julie when we could <u>both</u> be gettin' some o' this fine local action. It's not like she's gonna know. Out of town, under five minutes, and in a coma don't <u>count</u>.
What?: Sorry. The women here aren't my type. Most of them aren't even my <u>species</u>.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Aaah, it's the same as always...poor mope's just wishin' he was me.
What?: I've been trying to get through to the head guy - the nightmare god - what's his name?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: My Fellow Americans. I have a dream. Let us boldly go where no man has gone before.
What?: I'm sorry, Kitty - what were you saying?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Come on, pal! It was a compliment! You'da done the same if you had the equipment!
What?: THAT DOES IT! BACK IN THE PACK!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I'm reportin' this to my union!!
What?: <u>What</u> union?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I left my phone number in your undies. Try not to lose it in traffic.
What?: Sorry, Kitty! I'll be right back after I choke my monkey.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: He's ninety. He's practically dead already. How come <u>he</u> goes back and <u>I</u> stay here?
What?: Maybe he wanted to pick out his own casket?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: <u>He</u> got an E-ticket. Where's mine? <u>When do I get</u> <u>to wake up</u>??
What?: Stu? Stu? Let's not disturb the nice Reaper.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I've been stuck down here for <u>months</u>. Somebody had better start paying attention, or I'm gonna - I'm gonna <u>kick ass</u>!
What?: Let's not kick the nice Reaper's ass.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Y'call that art? Why, my three-year-old can paint better than that.
What?: Like you'd know. You started out on the back of a napkin, you little...<u>doodle</u>.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: How'd <u>you</u> get in there?
What?: Stu... It's a <u>party</u>.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Pact? Pact? NO LIFE SUPPORT??
What?: Well - yeah - but that doesn't...<u>apply</u>. It was different then. I was <u>depressed</u>. My life is great now. I'm in love!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I'm so dumb! I <u>deserve</u> to die -
What?: Mr. Hypnos, you run this place. I'm begging you. There's gotta be something I can do.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Fate worse than death! Well, it's been real, boss, but I gotta go buff up my resum. ANYBODY HERE NEED A FIGMENT?
What?: Fine! Don't put yourself out. I'll go to the land of Death alone.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Stu, you have my <u>absolute confidence</u>. - DEAD MAN! DEAD MAN WALKING!!
What?: I've got one chance to get back to Julie, and I'm gonna take it - with or without you.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Hey. Aren't you gonna talk me into it?
What?: No. Goodbye. Thanks for nothing.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You gotta talk me into it. You'll screw up on your own. I mean, a guy's gotta have a sidekick. For moral support! Wisecracks - snappy banter - It's the land of Death, Stu, the Land of Death! Don't go in there without your comedy relief!!
What?: All right. You can come.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: OH, THANK YOU! THANK YOU! TH-- Something went very, very wrong here.
What?: Now we just gotta figure out how to get there.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: He's taking her to the land of Death, right? So all we've gotta do is...hitch a ride! Stop shaking! I'll protect you.
What?: Oh, <u>sure</u>. Mr. Action Hero! Why couldn't I be Arnold Schwarzenegger's figment?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Where'd he go??
What?: I don't <u>know</u>.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Stu...Stu...
What?: IT'S NOT WORKING.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Stu...LOOK!
What?: What?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You saved my life, Monkeybone. I never would've made it without you.
What?: Move it. We got exactly five minutes left.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: It's just...now that I'm leaving, I feel like there's lots of things I haven't said. Who's gonna look out for you? Are you gonna be okay when I'm gone?
What?: Oh, don't you worry. I'll be fine.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Awwww. Worried about my feelings, are you? Well, there's a new twist.
What?: Don't joke around, little buddy. I mean it. I really do love y--

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I told you to leave or die, you refused, and now you may have killed us all. For you have unleashed the creature that we have feared for more than four thousand years.
What?: Relax, I got him.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: No mortal weapons can kill this creature. He is not of this world.
What?: Are we talkin, about the same creature? The walking corpse? Really big mouth? Really bad breath?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You know where he's taking her?
What?: Yes. To Hamunaptra. To perform the ritual.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Who the hell are these guys?
What?: Priests. Imhotep's priests.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I never killed a priest before.
What?: They are evil, cursed, they matter not.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: We saved him! Saved him before the creature could finish his work. Now leave, all of you, quickly, before he finishes you all.
What?: You're not going to kill us?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: And what ritual would that be?
What?: The ritual to bring the body of Anck- su-namun back to life.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: And how does one do that?
What?: By reading the Book Of The Dead.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Oh yes, of course.
What?: And then killing your sister.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: If he arrives before us, it will be too late.
What?: Did you say 'kill' my sister?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Personally, I would like to surrender. Why can we not just surrender?
What?: Shut-up and gimme your bandolier.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Now go find me a big stick.
What?: In the desert? What for?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: How'd a guy like you end up in the Legion anyways?
What?: I got caught robbing a synagogue. Lots of good stuff in them holy places

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Altar boys?
What?: Exactly! I speak seven languages, including Hebrew, so my specialty was synagogues. How about you? Kill somebody?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What then? Robbery? Extortion? Kidnapping!
What?: None of the above, thank you.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: My very good friend! What a surprise.
What?: Why if it ain't my little buddy, Beni. I oughta kill you.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You never were any good with the ladies, O'Connell.
What?: So you're the one leading the Americans, I shoulda figured. So what's the scam? You get 'em out in the middle of the desert then leave 'em to rot?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: The girl saved my life, figured it was the least I could do, keep her out of trouble.
What?: You always did have more balls than brains.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Let's make us even, shall we?
What?: Even?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: O'Connell! I am going to kill you for this!
What?: Sounds familiar.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Hey O'Connell! Looks to me like I got all the horses!
What?: Hey Beni! Looks to me like your on the wrong side of the river!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Ten to one, O'Connell, your odds are no-so-good.
What?: I've had worse.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Goin' somewhere?
What?: Just looking for you, O'Connell! I wanted to be with my friend!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: C'mon, friend.
What?: Why do you like to fight so much?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Beni ya little stinkweed, where did you slink off to?
What?: You left me! You left me in the desert to rot.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Oh yeah,... sorry bout that.  So who's this guy?
What?: This is Prince Imhotep, High Priest of Osiris.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: The Prince does not like to be touched by other humans. A Silly eastern superstition, I'm afraid.
What?: Yeah, well, we all got our little problems today don't we?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: He has come to help Mister Burns. Somehow I feel responsible.
What?: Don't gimme that, you never had any scruples.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Where's your new friend?
What?: What friend? You're my only friend.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Then you got no excuse for living. What the hell you doin, being buddies with this creep, Beni? What's in it for you?
What?: It is better to be the right hand of the Devil,... than in his path. As long as I serve him, I am immune.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Immune from what?
What?: You shall see.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: The book! The black book they found at Hamunaptra! Imhotep wants it back. Said to me it would be worth it's weight in diamonds.
What?: What does he want the book for?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Like what that Moses guy did to that Pharaoh guy?
What?: That's one way of putting it.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What just happened?
What?: All I remember is him turning into a blast of sand,... and then I remember nothing.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Yeah?
What?: Oh yes, always.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: ...and how do you say? Those slimy things, in your stomach?
What?: Intestines.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I'm sorry, it was an accident.
What?: When Ramesses destroyed Syria, it was an accident. You are a catastrophe! Why do I put up with you?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You put up with me, because I can read and write ancient Egyptian, decipher hieroglyphs and hieratic, and I'm the only person within a thousand miles who knows how to properly code and catalogue this library.
What?: Who needs smart women? I put up with you because your mother and father were our finest patrons, Allah rest their souls. Now straighten up this mess!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: See the cartouche there, it's the official royal seal of Seti the First, I'm sure of it.
What?: Perhaps.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Miss Carnavon. Gentlemen.
What?: What is he doing here?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: And you think this justifies killing innocent people!?
What?: To have stopped this creature? Yes!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: In the necropolis, when I saw him, - alive,... walking, he called me Anck- su-namun. And then in Mister Burns' quarters he tried to kiss me.
What?: It is because it was you who read from the Book. He has chosen you to be the human sacrifice needed to regenerate the body of Anck-su-namun.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I'm thinking that if the black Book Of The Dead can bring people back to life --
What?: -- then perhaps, the golden Book Of The Living can return them to the underworld.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: She is like all the others. She will die in the desert.
What?: No! She has seen too much. She knows too much.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: The key!? She has the lost key!?
What?: Yes. No one has ever had so much, been so close. We must stop her, or it will be the end of us all.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Then we will kill her, we will kill her and all those with her.
What?: And burn the map and retrieve the key.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: It will be done. But what of the American expedition? They leave tomorrow as well.
What?: Forget the bumbling Americans, they will be like all the others. Without the map to guide them, how can they possibly find Hamunaptra?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I'm willin, to go on a little faith, here.
What?: You will not believe it.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Okay, let's cut to the chase. He's afraid of cats, what's that about?
What?: According to the ancients, cat's are the guardians at the gates of the underworld. Imhotep will fear them until he is fully regenerated, and then he will fear nothing.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: So your sayin', if we find the book made outta gold --
What?: -- And read the sacred incantations contained inside it.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You think it'll send this guy back to hell?
What?: Correct, And that's when --

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Which would be located not far to the east of the Anubis statue.
What?: Don't tell me we gotta go back out there?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: See! That proves it! Old Seti's fortune's gotta be under this sand!
What?: For them to protect it like this, you just know there's got to be treasure down there.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I wouldn't trade ya for a brass spittoon!
What?: Yeah! It's supposed to be made outta pure gold!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: The sun turning black.
What?: Water turning to blood.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You bastards!
What?: What did you do to him!?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: The hell with that! I'm not goin' nowhere! We're safe here.
What?: Yeah, I'm not leavin, this fort for nothin'.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: The hell with this. I'm goin, downstairs to get me a drink. You want somethin'?
What?: Yeah, get me a glass of bourbon, a shot of bourbon and a bourbon chaser.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: And what is he in prison for?
What?: I did not know, so when I heard you were coming, I asked him that myself.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: And what did he say?
What?: He said... he was just looking for a good time.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Where are they taking him?
What?: To be hanged.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: No women allowed.
What?: I am an English woman.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I will give you one hundred pounds to spare his life.
What?: I would pay one hundred pounds just to see him hang.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Two hundred pounds.
What?: Proceed!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You lie.
What?: I would never!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Are you saying this filthy godless son of a pig knows where to find The City Of The Dead? Truly?
What?: Yes and if you cut him down, we will give you ten percent.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Fifty percent.
What?: Twenty.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: A bright good morning to all.
What?: What are you doing here?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Do you realize, we are standing inside a room that no one has entered in over four thousand years.
What?: Who cares? I don't see no treasure.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: So who's the broad?
What?: Broad?!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: We uh,... found... your puzzle box, and we've come to ask you about it.
What?: No.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: No?
What?: No... You came to ask me about Hamunaptra.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: How do you know the box pertains to Hamunaptra?
What?: Because that's where I found it. I was there.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You were actually at Hamunaptra?
What?: I just decked your brother

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Yeah, I was there.
What?: You swear?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Every damn day.
What?: No, I mean --

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: -- I know what you mean. I was there, alright. Seti's place. The City Of The Dead.
What?: What did you find? What did you see?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Could you tell me how to get there? The exact location?
What?: Want to know?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Yes.
What?: Really want to know?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Give... give him... give him GLAAAA-- !
What?: Twenty-five percent, and not one single farthing more.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Sorry, didn't mean to scare ya.
What?: The only thing that scares me, Mister O'Connell, are your manners.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Still angry that I kissed ya, huh?
What?: If you call that a kiss.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Did I miss something? Are we going into battle?
What?: The last time I was at that place everybody I was with died.
