Don't you think it kind of defeats the: A laugh can be a powerful thing, Eddie. Sometimes it's the only weapon we have in life.
What?: I think I prefer the Smith and Wesson variety.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I've met some cynical and miserable humans in my time.  But you, Edward Valiant, are positively funereal!
What?: Well, right now it's gonna be your funereal.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Hey, doesn't the rabbit even get a last request?
What?: A blindfold, cigarette, noseplugs? Just kidding.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Here you go, kid... say hi to Casper for me.
What?: But, Eddie, you know what happens when...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Oh, Eddie, that was quick thinkin'. Nothin' like usin' the old noggin, the noodle, the grey matter...
What?: If I'm so smart, how come I'm runnin' from the law with a Toon?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Valiant and Valiant?  Who's the other Valiant?
What?: My brother.  Get inside.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: So what's our plan, our scenario, our modus operandi?
What?: We can't do anything till it's dark.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Say, who's this guy laughin'?
What?: Me.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Gee, I didn't recognize you... I've never seen you laugh before.  That your brother makin' the rabbit ears?
What?: What is this, Twenty Questions?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You damn Toon!  No wonder they picked you for the patsy.  Always gotta play the fool.  You make me sick!
What?: Gee, you shamuses are a tough audience, but what happened to you that was so dark, lurid, embittering?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You wanna know?  Well, since you're so goddamn curious, I'll tell ya.  One of you Toons killed my brother.
What?: A Toon?  Noooo.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Yeah, a Toon.  It was the guy who killed Bambi's mother.
What?: Him?  Oh, he was vile, heinous, despicable... a smear on the drafting board.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Yeah, everybody thought so.  But me and Teddy got a kick out of Toons.  All Toons.  We couldn't see the bad in 'em. And when this guy was accused of knockin' over the First National Bank of Toontown, we took his case.  But when we looked into it, we found out he did do it after all.  We went to his house to take him in.  But he was wise. He got the drop on us... literally.
What?: Safe?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I'll get it.
What?: Get away from there.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Wrong number?
What?: No, it's not.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Gee, Eddie, you're not gonna go, are ya?  Maroon'll be layin' for ya at nine o'clock.
What?: That's why I'll be there at 8:45.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I tell you what, maybe I better come with you.
What?: Forget it.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You know, Eddie, I'm not as much of a chump, and a patsy, a yokel as you think.
What?: How much is a shave and a haircut, Roger?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Two bits.
What?: I rest my case.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: If I don't make it back here by ten...
What?: Yeah?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What the hell are you doin' in there?
What?: I followed you to the Maroon Studios. When I heard those shots, I thought I'd help you and investigate the inside of this trunk.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Real good, Rog... but maybe you better let me take over.
What?: Not before I satisfy my sense of moral outrage.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: That's not blood.  That's ink.  That goof Acme squirted me with some the other day.  Why it's comin' 'through now, I don't know.
What?: That's because it's Disappearing-Reappearing Ink.  Shows up three days later.  Gives you enough time to get away from the victim so he doesn't punch you in the nose.  Great gag.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Say Roger, remember that love letter you wrote your wife at the Ink & Paint Club?
What?: Yeah?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I think you oughta read it to her.
What?: Good idea.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Keep reading...
What?: Hey, it's the will.  I, Marvin Acme, of sound mind and body, hoo-hoo-hoo-hoo, do hereby bequeath in perpetuity the property known as Toontown to those loveable characters...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: No, kid, you're a real hero.
What?: I guess I am at that.  Cigar?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: By the way, Roger, you were right about your wife.  She's a good lady.  I'm glad you got her back.
What?: And I'm glad you got your sense of humor back.  Think you'll keep it?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Pretty good cigar.  Where'd you get it?
What?: From this box here...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: If we could speak alone.
What?: This is not a time for frivolity, Katrina, is it?  Am I mistaken?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Excuse me, gentlemen, but... who has seen this Horseman?
What?: Many have.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Who took the meat?
What?: Must have been the Redman.  A Lenape Indian lives in the Western Woods.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Hail, Constable.  How are you?
What?: Well enough.  Your gathering does honor to the deceased.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Um... I... I did not... no.  Why?
What?: Sarah has gone missing... my servant girl.  Her things are gone.  Damn it. She has joined the migration out of town.  What about breakfast, woman?  Or, am I to starve to death?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Clergyman Steenwyck is calling a meeting.  This time he is determined to have you forced out, or worse.
What?: How did you hear this?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Certainly not.
What?: Excuse me, Miss...  They have a laugh at your expense.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: We haven't heard your name yet, friend.
What?: Well, unless your name is Baltus, you should not worry over mine.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What the hell are you doing?
What?: You are the blacksmith.  Ever shod a horse with a hoof this large?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: They spend two days in chains.
What?: Two days... ?  For murder?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Constable Crane is not the only one who fights with science on his side.
What?: I fired upon the Horseman and the bullet did nothing.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You must have missed your mark.
What?: I hit him square.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: An honor, gentlemen.  In time I will need every detail of the three murderings you've had, but, for now, I ask only if you have any theory at all as to who the killer might be?
What?: Excuse me?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I say, is there any one person suspect in these acts?
What?: I was afraid of this.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Why did you move the body, Doctor?
What?: To place it inside its coffin.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: No bleeding.
What?: What is that?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: We must be a curious sight to him.
What?: What are you spying on?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: He is a behemoth.
What?: A diseased monster.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: The wounds are the same.  Cauterized. No chopping or half-measures either. One stroke took the head.  Have you seen, doctor... ?  Even the spinal bone... sliced as smooth as butter.
What?: I do not care.  You are welcome to use my work area, but I beg you... return her to her resting place.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Keep still, Constable.  You were half-drowned when they found you.
What?: ... Brom Bones...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: He is dead.  You would be also, if your wound had not somehow shut.
What?: Bring Young Masbath here.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You need to sleep.
What?: Bring him.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: It has been a terrible jolt to her nerves.
What?: You will stay at her side?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: ... help yourself, you pompous ass. I will be in bed.
What?: Would you stay, doctor?  I may need assistance.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Stains of blood.
What?: What of it?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: No clotting or gathering of pus.  No healing at all.
What?: What?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Why not tell us what you have heard? Hmm?  How much have your superiors bothered to tell you?
What?: All I know is three are slain, their heads found severed from their bodies...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: It is sacrilege!
What?: I cannot proceed without examining the previous victims.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I will not allow it.  I will not!
What?: Protest to my superiors if you like.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Your superiors are two days away!
What?: Then, you should have left two days ago, because I have men willing to help me today.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: For poaching.  Or, would you remake our laws now that Magistrate Philipse has given up the ghost?
What?: Does that look like an animal hanging?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Only if I repeat them outside this room.  And, I will if I must...  Out there, for all to hear.  Or... you may speak, as planned.  But, you tell them you feel compelled to move on to greener pastures.
What?: No.  You will not run me out.  No one will believe a word of what you say.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Oh?  Far as I can tell, a rumor does not travel alone for long here.
What?: Are you a deist?  Is that it?  A free thinker who does not believe in divinity.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: It is only important what you are. An adulterer...
What?: I am the Lord's voice in this town.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Wallowing in sin and lust...
What?: They need guidance.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Wallowing quite literally in blood.
What?: Damn you, sir!  God damn you to hell!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You are so upset now... and yet, you seemed in such good spirits last night.
What?: You cannot do this.  I am a man of God!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Taken.  Taken by the Headless Horseman.  Taken back to hell.
What?: Pardon me?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Just a moment...  Are you saying it is he?
What?: When a goblin leaps from the nether world, others follow.  Poltergeists of the air, water and earth follow and cheer his desecrations!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Do you have these persons' wills?
What?: I have everything... last testaments... birth certificates, death certificates... deeds.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: May I see them, Master Hardenbrook?
What?: Hmm?  See them?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: May we look at them now?
What?: Of course.  You want them... it shall not take long.  Wait here.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Maybe you should take this.
What?: A fine idea.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Damn... damn... damn...
What?: Master Hardenbrook...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Perhaps, I could assist in finding them?
What?: Well... that might be... helpful.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Just a moment... if I may.  It is possible this man was murdered.
What?: He drowned.  Anyone could see.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: He will be burned pursuant to statutes of health.
What?: I could determine if he were dead <u>before</u> he went into the Hudson.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Our first night watch is adequate against fire and some violence, but if we were more often able to ensure justice, after the fact, then criminals would truly have something to fear from law enforcement.
What?: Have they nothing to fear presently?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Without disrespect, look around you.  We overflow.  As do our courts.
What?: And, <u>with</u> disrespect, Constable, if jails and courts overflow, it is testimony to success, not failure.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Very few, if any.
What?: Even though I have seen confessions pried from the lips of the accused, often quite literally?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: For one who calls himself a Federalist, your mouth reeks of Republican liberalism.
What?: Not Liberalism.  Equanimity.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: There is a farming community upstate, Constable... ten days journey north in the Hudson Highlands.  It is named Sleepy Hollow.  Within a fortnight, three persons have been murdered there. Each with their head lopped cleanly off.  The elders of the Hollow have sent dispatches to me, requesting assistance, and now, just this very moment, I have chosen you.
What?: Chosen me?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: These "methods" of yours... there has been no practical application.
What?: Not for lack of trying.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Just so.  Granted.  And so you take your experimentations to Sleepy Hollow and catch the murderer who has tainted the place.  Bring him here to face our good justice. Will you do this for me?
What?: I shall, gladly.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Master Crane, sir.  I'm glad we have time alone.  You've been told plenty about the Horseman, I'm certain.
What?: More than enough, actually.  I beg you, no more, please.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Tell me something.  What becomes of Young Masbath?
What?: Van Ripper and his wife agreed to take him.  They have children and a good home and good land.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: The Widow Windsor.
What?: Is that all you say?  Look at her.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Well, Constable... are you aware... to be honest, you are not what we expected.  We sent for the militia.
What?: The militia?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: The Van Garretts died first
What?: And now Jonathan Masbath.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Why would he flee this direction, with so much open ground to cross before he reached cover?
What?: He would not have gone into the Western Woods.  No sane man would.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: ... found the body this morning.  You do believe now, don't you?
What?: Believe?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What is that you wear?
What?: My talisman.  It will, protect against the Horseman if I show a brave face.  But, I cannot run.  If I run in fear, it is worthless.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Not more than a year ago, a mob hung a man for stealing a horse.  For stealing a horse!  And, you dig up our dead.
What?: Are you saying I should be frightened? Is this a message passed on from Clergyman Steenwyck?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: We are farmers here, not lawyers or bankers, or even constables.  Every penny we earn comes from what we send down the Hudson.
What?: I know it.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Listen to what you say....
What?: No, you listen!  You may think we are a pack of superstitious dullards...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I am not here for revenge.  I am here to bring justice.
What?: Whatever.  You still need a second to tend to your things.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I manage fine alone.
What?: I deserve to help you.  Don't you see how much this means?  My father... he... he was a good man...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Young Masbath, I am sorry for your loss.  It is a great and sad tragedy. However... I cannot be the one to look after you now.
What?: I did not ask you to, did I?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What is the common thread between these victims?
What?: I'm sure I don't know.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: The Lenape Indian had much to tell once I opened his mouth.
What?: How could he?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Where are we going?
What?: Up.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What is it?
What?: It's payment day.  Loan monies are given to Baltus the last day each month.  Almost everyone borrows... for tools or to hire workers.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Out there.  What do you see?
What?: The Western Woods.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Are you familiar with magnets?
What?: What kind of nuts?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: It's spectacular.
What?: Yes... I suppose it is.  Keep it.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: No, I couldn't...
What?: I have others.  All I need is this.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Thank you.
What?: Now, hold the bowl steady.  Back to business.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: If the Western Woods are truly the Devil's Glen, we will see for ourselves.
What?: Father said witches live there.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What is it?
What?: Listen.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I hear nothing.
What?: No crickets or cicadas calling.  No bird songs.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: We are leaving.
What?: What happened?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Follow the Indian trail to where the sun dies.  To the tree of the dead.  Maybe we passed it by.
What?: How could something named "the tree of the dead" fail to draw attention?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: We should not go much further in this murk.
What?: Should we go back?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What does it mean... climb down to the Horseman's soulless place?
What?: "Let loose his silent shrieking." Who knows, till we work at it?  I admit not being anxious to find out.  "He who holds the Horseman's desire will guide his reaping hand." Whatever the Horseman's desire is, other than extinguishing lives.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: If the Crone's wound bled hard, that means she was not killed by the Hessian.  Someone only tried to make it look that way.
What?: You grow sharper by the minute, little man.  It boggles my mind, but I begin to prefer your company over all others.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Well... I'm one of the few people who likes you.
What?: True enough.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Then, who murdered the Old Crone?  And why?
What?: Good questions, deserving answers, of which we are in short supply.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What is it?
What?: Stay back.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Must be some sort of gateway.  But, why this place... ?
What?: We should go.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Someone left last night.  Looked like they headed to the square, but I lost them in the forest.
What?: Man or woman?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: All I saw was their lantern.
What?: Business, best hidden is hidden best at night.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: If someone has the Horseman's skull... if they control the Horseman, then why haven't they sent him for your head yet?
What?: Because, I serve a fine purpose alive. It is perfection for our murderer if I return to New York City with nothing more than tales of a galloping ghoul.  We must uncover the reason these victims were targeted.  What was taken from them... other than their lives? Who benefits by their deaths?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What good is this?
What?: To discover what might have been taken from those who died, it will help to know what was there that could be taken in the first place.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: My father had farm land.  It was the only thing we owned of any value.
What?: And it now belongs to you, according to Baltus.  I heard him say it.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Only the heirs were killed.  Proof that the Horseman slaughters by assignment.
What?: But, if the farm is not mine, who stole it away?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: No one yet, far as I can tell.  It has gone intestate.
What?: In test... what?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Intestate.  Your farm... all the farms... they belong to no one.
What?: What does it mean?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Often in such cases, property which has gone intestate legally passes to whomever the deceased was indebted to. And, who in this town is owed a great many debts?
What?: Baltus Van Tassel.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Did your father take a loan?
What?: Yes.  I rode with him on payment days.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: There is no Masbath here.  My father's loan papers are missing.
What?: There are none for Magistrate Philipse either.  "Paasch, James" "Pieter, Thomas" "Pos, William."

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I was getting worried.  Who was it?
What?: Lady Van Tassel.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What was she doing?
What?: Something I really wish I had not seen. Never mind it.  Did you find the victims' loan agreements?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: There are no other doors.  This is as far as she could have gone.
What?: It is nothing.  She comes to read books, so her father will not find her.  It is absolutely nothing.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What books?
What?: Fiction plays and novels.  Baltus does not approve.  Now, come.  It may not be long before Lady Van Tassel returns.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What now?  Where is she?
What?: Things have become complicated. Katrina is at the mill.  Ride ahead, find her and bring her to meet me outside the church.  Find her at all costs.  Quickly.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: She's the one who controlled the Horseman, isn't she, sir?  Sir?
What?: I need time for thinking.  Without you hanging on my coattails for a change.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Won't you change your mind, sir? What can I say to convince you?
What?: Nothing.  To hell with this place and all the people here.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Why... why are you like this?
What?: You do not know all that has happened.  You cannot understand.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: This is farewell.
What?: Take me with you.  There's nothing left for me here.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Climb up!
What?: Lady Van Tassel...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What can we do?
What?: Take the reins.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What now?
What?: I doubt that's the end.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: How are you?
What?: Tired.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Forgive me, I didn't know.
What?: I... I am looking for Baltus Van Tassel.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Did they tell?  It is something in the air so that dreams come to everyone.  According to the elders, an Indian prophet held powwows here before the land was taken, and spells cast then still linger to this day.
What?: Do you often make a habit of sitting on strange men's beds?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You are horribly old-fashioned, aren't you?
What?: Feel free to form your own opinion.  Though it appears you already have.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Well, I intended to apologize for the behavior of my friend Brom Van Brunt, but it seems I've made matters worse.  I'll leave you to your business.
What?: Excuse me... I should apologize.  I, um... I... have no great love of...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Other people?
What?: Small talk.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Is it me, or are you this nervous around all women?
What?: Perhaps it is because your suitor's hands were recently very nearly wrapped around my throat.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: My suitor?
What?: The massive fellow... Brom.  For someone you call "friend," he misplaces a good portion of jealousy.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: He has proposed to me twice.
What?: Which may explain his temperament. To have asked twice means the answer was "no" at least once.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I've read a great deal about your New York City.  Do be a dear and tell me all about it.  Sounds like an extraordinary place to live a life.
What?: Extra ordinary, yes.  But first, you tell me about the Headless Horseman.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Not all think it is the Horseman. Many say witches come from the Western Woods to steal skulls for their cauldrons.  Some believe a person in this very town kneels before Lucifer, offering death as tribute.  And, still others believe none of it.
What?: Are you so superstitious?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: To call a person superstitious is to imply they fear magic, but not all magic is black.
What?: There is no such thing as magic.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Really?  Then... what is your rebuttal to those romantic poets claiming proof of magic in a rose at full bloom, or even in a teardrop?
What?: Poets have silly notions about plants and bodily secretions.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You do not disturb me.  Please stay. Having trouble sleeping?
What?: May I ask... why do you cover your book that way?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You pay great attention to small things.  I hide these as I hide all my books.  Father would not approve, lest it were the Bible.
What?: I, um... I have something to show you, if you have a moment.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: These scars.  How did you get them?
What?: I have had them since childhood.  I cannot remember what from.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Here it is.  A bird on one side. His cage on the other.  Now, stare at it.  The bird seems to be in his cage.
What?: Yes, he does.  May I try?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: He only appears to be inside the cage.  The point being...
What?: You made this, and the drawings?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Yes, but listen.  The illusion is easily explained.  The eye retains each image, till they combine.  And yet, some would call this toy magic.
What?: Don't you see why?  Look closely a moment.  Put your intellect aside.  Can't you see what is inexplicable?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Oh, you are hopeless.  May I keep it at least?
What?: If you want.  But...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Thank you.  No.  Here...
What?: I insist that you have it.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Very well.  But, it will only sit gathering dust.
What?: That would be a pity.  Those words might show you something you've never seen before.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You promised justice.
What?: If these are the random stalkings of a monster, what good am I?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: People have put their trust in you.
What?: They have done nothing of the sort.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Why would you do such a thing?
What?: No stone may be left unturned.  It may appear harsh...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I have misjudged you I think.  I did not imagine you were so cruel.
What?: You are not regarding it in full. The Widow Windsor had been run through by a sword.  I followed the bloodless wound, a wound whose path I could not comprehend till I had seen the Horseman with my own eyes.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What are you on about?
What?: The child she carried was eight months grown at least... near to birthing.  The sword had pierced its tiny heart exactly.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Must I hear this?
What?: There was no blind stabbing.  This singular thrust found its target omnipotently, as if the Horseman made certain the unborn child died with its mother.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: And this gives worth to butchery?
What?: It was not butchery.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What is it then?  Scientific method? How can any of this matter in the slightest?
What?: I have no solution for its meaning yet, but I could not just ignore it.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Take a lesson from Young Masbath's desires, Ichabod Crane.  He follows with you to avenge his father's death. That I understand.  But, what do you want?
What?: To avenge his father, and the others.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You falter with your answer because you strive without putting the whole of your heart into it.  Can't you see? You'll bring dignity to the dead even if you have to chop them into little pieces to do it.
What?: If it had been surgery on a living person, done to save that person's life, you would not question it.  Not for a moment.  So, let me be the first to tell you, dear girl... on the other side of these sheltering mountains, a whole world has advanced beyond such plebeian thinking as yours.  And someday, no matter how much you fear it, that world will come to roust Sleepy Hollow out of its slumber.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Allow me some time.  I have spent every hour in the company of others. I need to be alone.
What?: What troubles you?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: The things I said to you before... I was wrong to say them.
What?: No, actually, you were not.  Every word you spoke had truth in it.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Lady Van Tassel... she is your stepmother, isn't she?  She bears so little resemblance.
What?: What?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: She is not your birth mother, is she?
What?: No, but... why do you ask that?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What happened to your mother?  Is she still alive?
What?: She died.  Her lungs were diseased... two years ago.  What is this about?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Memories have come back.  I had them forgotten, and wish I could forget them again... but they are here now.  Lord, how I hate this place.
What?: If you want me to go, I will.  Do you want me to leave?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: It is only me.
What?: Katrina.  Why do you follow?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I apologize if I worried you.
What?: A woman should not be out alone in these woods.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Blood.
What?: What did you say?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What are you doing?
What?: Just... keep where you are.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: My God... what has happened?
What?: He... he tries to take the heads... they will not pass.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Why is it every grave I open holds a new mystery inside?
What?: The skull is gone.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What... what are you doing... ?
What?: I'm drawing bad blood from the wound.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What is so urgent?
What?: Come with me.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I have been reading your journal. I'm sorry.  I found it too fascinating to resist.  I rode to catch up with you at the Notary, out of curiosity.  Before I found you though, I overheard what you were said.
What?: It was you there?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: When... when you spoke father's name along with accusations, I could not believe it.  I had to hide these... at least till I could confront him myself.
What?: And, what did he say?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: He did not do these things.  If you knew him, you would realize...
What?: What did he say, Katrina?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I have not been able to face him yet.
What?: The loans give the land to your father. It does not matter survivors are still on their farms.  They could be thrown off... tomorrow... a year from now.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Yes, I have seen that, and I told you why I hid them.
What?: What would you have me believe?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: If you think I am behind this, say it.
What?: The name Van Tassel is blackened.  You share that name.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Katrina...
What?: Speak the words, Constable.  What is stopping you?  What has happened to your ability to transcend sentimentality?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Where are we going?
What?: I do not know.  Away.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: The church.
What?: He moves too fast.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What was that?
What?: His horse.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Ichabod...
What?: Keep climbing.  I will follow...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Quickly, close it.
What?: No.  Get to the crest of the roof and be ready to jump.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: The blades will carry us to the ground. Face front and wait for me.
What?: I... I can't do this.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You said yourself.  What mere man could have downed the Belltower?
What?: It is a prime tenet of science, Philipse, that because one thing appears improbable does not mean you embrace the utterly fantastical.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Returning to the Western Woods?
What?: Yes, actually.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Use caution.
What?: Do you know... I think those are the first words I have heard from you my entire time here.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Excuse me, Lady Van Tassel... Katrina is not in her room.
What?: No.  She has gone out.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Where?
What?: She has taken the last of our grain to be milled.  You do have a background in the medical arts, don't you, Constable?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: It appears well.  It has already clotted.
What?: Look closer.  Do you have anything to clean it with?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I know you saw me.
What?: What... ?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You cannot kill what is already dead.
What?: Let her go!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Van Ripper.  Can you show where the body lay?
What?: I can show exactly.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Here... in front of this oak, facing north.  Horrible...
What?: To the best of your recollection, where did the open wound fall?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: There was not much blood, was there?
What?: I didn't see none.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Van Ripper, turn the coach about!
What?: What did you say?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Van Ripper... do you have a gun?
What?: Yes.  Here...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Pardon.  You did not answer when I knocked.  Are we intruding?
What?: You are from the Hollow?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: The Lenape who lived in these woods... do you know him?  The Redman?  I should tell you... he has been murdered.
What?: Leave me.  You are not welcome here.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I hear him.  He rides to the Hollow and back.
What?: The Horseman.  Yes.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Can you help?
What?: You want to see into the nether world... I can show you.  Whatever you see, do not move or speak.  I will hold him.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What... what are you doing?
What?: Close your mouth!  Keep silent.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Lay still, Ichabod.  Do not move.
What?: Doctor, he is awake.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You... you are alive.
What?: Am I?  Or, are you and Young Masbath dead along with me?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: He rides tonight.
What?: Father saw you die.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Imagine my surprise, finding him on a liason with a common servant.  A girl who had apparently become his secret love.
What?: No one will believe your lies, whore.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Go home.
What?: May I see my mother?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You do not want to be here.  Go home to your father.
What?: She did not do it... please listen...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: She is guilty.
What?: No, sir, please... she is innocent...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: She has confessed.
What?: No.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I'm Han Solo, Captain of this vessel.  Who's in charge then?
What?: I'm Ben Kenobi.  Luke Starkiller here is leading our expedition.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Well, we'll see...
What?: You might get your stuff together. We'll be coming up on Organa Major soon.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: The Empire must have gotten here first.
What?: The planet has been totally blown away!  It would have taken a thousand ships with a lot more fire power than I've ever seen... If the Empire had a new weapon that could do this... I would have heard something... I'd know about it.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Well, now you know... The enemy is on the move.  We haven't much time.
What?: Well, I've brought you here.  What now?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: We have to find he rebels... What we're carrying belongs to them.
What?: Their bases are very well hidden. All the power of the Empire can't find them... Do you know where they are?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: No, not anymore.
What?: I'm not taking you on an impossible search across the galaxy... I was only paid to get you here and now you're here.  I'll take my other five thousand and you're on your own... I'll leave you on the nearest system.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Well, for one reason, we don't have your other five thousand.
What?: Who's going to pay me then?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I think there are some things we should talk about.
What?: I'm beginning not to like you.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: How much do you think she's talking about?
What?: A million at least... If this robot has information related to the destruction of Organa Major, you'll be able to name the reward...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Luke's got a point... ... Fear is their greatest defense... I doubt if the actual security there is much greater than on Aquilae or Sullust, and what there is is most likely directed toward large-scale assault.
What?: This isn't a game, you know.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Kid, you take the glory and the good intentions and I'll take the reward.
What?: Fear is their greatest weapon.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You have your father's style.  You've done very well.
What?: Not bad.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: We're into the second perimeter. They'll be coming out to blast us shortly.  I was wondering if you had some kind of a plan or are we going to try to blast our way in?
What?: Check your data banks for all the information you have on Imperial procedures.  Both of you will have to learn...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: We're going to get in by studying Imperial procedures?  I don't like it.
What?: All right then, we'll use your plan.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I'll get the information.
What?: ... and I want you to start cleaning the equipment out of the scan- shielded compartments.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Darth Vader is on this system.  I can feel him.  I can feel the Kiber Crystal.
What?: Is that good or bad?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Don't look at me.  I'm just a pilot. I got you here... You've got to do the rest.
What?: There is a greater risk in staying here, you know.  If you don't find the princess, then the whole trip was for nothing... wasn't it?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: That's straight through the central core... up toward the top of the city... Once you've got her, avoid the main transports, they'll shut down immediately.  Your only chance is through the service shafts. There are no sensors there... All right now, get going, you don't have time.  I hope you can remember everything.
What?: We'll be back before you are, old man.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Good morning!
What?: What do you mean, 'good morning'? Do you mean that it is a good morning for you, or do you wish me a good morning, although it is obvious I'm not having one, or do you find that mornings in general are good?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Sorry, but that was the only way to get you down.
What?: Couldn't we have tried to think of something else first!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I'm Luke Starkiller, guardian of the Bendu.
What?: Oh, so you're a warrior then?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Who are you anyway?
What?: You might say I'm part of the landscape here.  They call me Ben Kenobi.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You're General Kenobi?!?  The Jedi knight!  The commander of the White Legions?
What?: I'm afraid it's been a long time since the White Legions roamed the stars.  But I have the memories.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I don't see why.  I don't believe we've ever met.
What?: I am the son of Annikin Starkiller.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I know who you are.  Stand up so that we can talk properly.  You're embarrassing me.  I'm not that important.
What?: But you are... I know your 'Diary of the Clone Wars' by heart.  My father...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I... I'm not a Bendu Officer.  I'm not even a startrooper.
What?: I know that.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You saw through me?
What?: You could put it that way.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I assure you my intentions weren't bad.
What?: I know your intentions.  I probably know much more about you than you realize.  In many ways you're a lot like your father.  He was an indulgent man, but a clever warrior.  Now what brings you out here?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I'm afraid I've gotten too old for this sort of thing.
What?: But you must!  I can't do it alone. I'm not at all like my father.  I'd never make it.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I already know you think you're worthless.  I recommend you learn to think of yourself in a better light, for what you believe you are is what you become.  I haven't been involved in anything like this for many years.
What?: But the Sith Lords are involved! Whatever information this R-2 unit is carrying, it must be awfully important.  They're probably looking for him... I'm no match for the Sith. This is a Jedi's work.  This is your responsibility!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You were right.  It is my responsibility.  The Force of Others brought the message to you and then it brought you to me.
What?: My father used to talk about the Force of Others.  But he never told me what it was...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Let's just say the Force is something a Jedi Warrior deals with.  It is an energy field in oneself, a power that controls ones acts, yet obeys ones commands.  It is nothing, yet it makes marvels appear before your very eyes. All living things generate this Force field, even you.
What?: You mean I generate an energy field?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: It surrounds you and radiates from you.  A Jedi can feel it flowing from him...  ... from here!
What?: Could I learn to feel it?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: That is not a human decision, not your or mine.
What?: What do you mean?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Luke, I'm coming along to do what I can, but I'm tired and I'm depending on you to get us through.
What?: But you're still a powerful Jedi. You don't need my help.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: A Jedi's power is measured by the amount of the Force that is stored within him, and I have little of the Force left in me.
What?: How can you store an energy field within you?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: When a creature dies, the force it generated remains.  The Force is all around us.  It can be collected and transmitted through the use of a Kiber crystal.  It's the only way to amplify the power of the Force within you.
What?: Don't you have a Kiber crystal?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I had one, but it was taken at the battle of Condawn...
What?: That's where my father was killed.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Yes.  It was a black day.  One of my disciple's took the crystal and became a Sith Lord.  It was a black day.  The few crystals that remain are in the possession of the Sith Lords on Alderaan.  That's how they've become so powerful.
What?: Do the Sith know the ways of the Force?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: They use the Bogan Force.
What?: Like Bogan weather, or bogan times. I thought that was just a saying.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: We don't have that kind of money. How much do you think I can get for the speeder?
What?: Five, maybe.  Let me handle it.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: This is the last place.  Shouldn't we just take what we can get and think of something else?
What?: He's bluffing...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: When we get Artoo's message to them, you think they'll try to rescue the princess?
What?: I doubt it.  It would be foolish for the rebel forces to come out of hiding. I know your feelings.  You'd best forget them.  It's for your own good. There will be no saving her from the prisons of Alderaan.  It's the heart of the Sith.  The Bogan Force is the most heavy there.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: But she's a member of The Twelve Families.  How can they hold her?
What?: These are doubtful times.  The Empire has grown bold in its disregard of the...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What's wrong?  What's happening?
What?: Keep away, I'm fine, I'm fine.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Are you all right?
What?: Yes... the Force... something horrible has happened.  I couldn't see what it was, or where it was, but it was terrible... terrible beyond description... the cry of millions dying at once.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Are you sure you don't need it?
What?: I rarely use it any more.  I have the Force.  The Force is more powerful than any pistol.  You shouldn't put too much faith in that weapon.  Work on becoming aware of the Force... learn to feel its presence within you.  Try to sense what it's telling you.  It's the only thing you can rely on.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What do I do?
What?: All you have to do is lose your thinking self.  Don't focus on anything.  Let your body do your thinking... You have to learn to act on what you feel, not what you think ... If I had the crystal, it would be much easier.  You could feel the Force immediately... but for now, let yourself go.  You'll pick it up... and someday you'll have no need for that pistol either.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What is it?
What?: He can't find Organa Major.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: But she is the only link between us and the hidden bases.
What?: You mean we should go after her!...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I can't see!  How can I fight?
What?: Try to feel it.  Use the Force...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I can't do it.  I'll get hit.
What?: Stop thinking, and start feeling. Let yourself go.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: See, once you let yourself go you can do it.  You'll get it.
What?: I don't get it, but I guess I did block it.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What about the princess?
What?: You go after the princess. I am an old man and would be of little help.  I must try to find the Crystal.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: The Kiber Crystal.
What?: Keep it with you always.  You'll have more need of it than I.  It will bring the Force to you.  You've already learned to feel it... Now you must learn to use it.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Of course, where you been kid?
What?: You look great!  The uniform and everything!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: That's no battle, kid... They're just sitting there!
What?: But there was a lot of firing earlier...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I'll tell you, Luke, and this is between you and me.  The star force isn't all it's cracked up to be. Frankly, it's a bore, and it's going to stay that way as long as this system is neutral...
What?: But you always said things were so great at the academy... What happened?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: The academy is fantastic... Of course, they won't teach you anything about flying you don't already know.  Most of the instructors are very conservative pilots.  You can fly circles around them... but there is a lot on the scientific side that is down-right amazing, and you get a lot of discipline... but after you graduate, don't join the star force -- go free-lance.  It's the only way to get into the action... I can't wait until my hitch is up.
What?: At least you're doing something... I'd give anything to be in your position.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You're Starkiller?
What?: Yes, sir.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Have you been checked out?
What?: Yes, sir.  I was considered one of the best bush pilots on Sullust. I've also had six hours on the T-2.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Six hours, huh?  Well, that's your ship there.  You're blue five.  You stay glued to me.  I don't want any independent operations out there. Personally I think it's foolish for them to be sending fresh kids out on a job like this.  This is no joy ride we're going on.
What?: Yes, sir.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Blue Five, does that glare bother you?
What?: I've got it blocked.  I'm all right.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I'm right behind you, Blue Leader.
What?: What's that?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Blue Five, break off your cover attack.  It's too late.  Make your own run on the exhaust port.  Do you copy, Luke?
What?: Yes, sir, but I can get him...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: No reply on any circuits... It's drifting on a point twenty-seven skew.  It's not close enough to identify.
What?: Alert squad five, but hold them until we know what it is.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Should we alert the Sith Lords?
What?: I'll make a report later.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: As close as we can make out, it appears to be a Corellian gypsy vessel... It's not under power.
What?: Send one squad up.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: We don't get many visitors.  Let's take a look at it.
What?: Send out a boarding party.  Full assault gear.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Put that thing away or you're going to get us all killed.
What?: Yes, your highness. I'll let you open it then.  It won't be too long before they figure out what happened to us.  This has turned into a brilliant escape!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Here come six more... grid two!
What?: Was this trip really necessary?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: There are only three or four left.
What?: Chewbacca, it's time we showed them this isn't the regulation F8-88 Cargo Trawler.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: All the data banks in Artoo are still secure.
What?: Then I think we're due the reward you offered... and it had better be substantial after what we've been through.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: When Artoo has been safely delivered to my forces, you get your reward. You have my guarantee.
What?: What's that little 'droid' carrying that's so blasted important?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: The plans and specifications to a battle station with enough fire power to destroy an entire system... Our only hope in destroying it is to find its weakness, which we will determine from the data I stored in Artoo.
What?: We captured the plans in a raid on the Imperial shipyards, but we fell under attack before I could get the data to safety, so I hid it in this Artoo unit and sent him off.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Where are you taking us now anyway?
What?: The fourth moon of Yavin.  I've given the coordinates to Chewbacca.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I don't see how we're going to find anything out here.  This terrain is hopeless.
What?: Did it occur to you they might find us?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: We must hurry to the base.  We have little time before the Death Star arrives.
What?: I'd like to get paid before that eventually.  I don't plan to stick around for the fireworks.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What about us?  Are we to wait forever?  Is our reward to be blown to bits on this forsaken system, while your fleet mounts some suicidal attack on that Death Star? Part of my reward is that I be around to spend it.
What?: I have little time for your mercenary concerns, but I am grateful for the service you have given to our cause.  What is your price?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Organa Major is a rebel system. There will be quite a few starfleet patrols between here and there... It could be a little tricky if you want to avoid them... ten thousand.
What?: That's pretty steep.  We'd like to talk it over first.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You got yourself a ship.  We can leave as soon as you're ready.
What?: We have a little business to take care of first, but it shouldn't take long. We'll be back shortly.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Who's the pilot?
What?: It's automatic.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I'd keep that thing close just in case, if I were you... I've been around from one end of the galaxy to the other and believe me this Force of Others stuff may make for good religion, but there is no substitute for a good weapon at your side.
What?: You don't believe in the Force?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I found it... It's just not there.
What?: What are you saying?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You can't!  We've come this far.  We must find them...
What?: Why?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Maybe you should just drop us off. I'm sure we can find someone willing to take the risk.
What?: All right, all right! You've got a ship!  But where do we go from here?  They probably took her to find the hidden bases... I don't see how we can find the rebels before she breaks.  The Empire has already beat us out.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: No, it's impossible... No one, and I mean no one would venture anywhere near the Alderaan system... I'm a free booter, not revolutionary.  You're aboard the wrong ship, son!
What?: Maybe the fact that no one would go there voluntarily could help us. They probably don't think anyone would dare try.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Well, I practice a lot...
What?: You're good with 'remotes,' but how are you against something living?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Between his howling and your blasting everything in sight, the entire city is going to know we're here.
What?: Good!  I prefer a straight fight to all this sneaking around.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: This isn't going to work.
What?: Why didn't you say so before.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Something has happened to them. Let's try this way...
What?: Let's try this way!  Holy Maker.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I think she's going to be all right.
What?: Not if this tunnel deadends.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Is he afraid of the water?
What?: No, he smells something... but we haven't time to worry about it now.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Watch it!  Move back.
What?: Get Chewbacca.  Try to get around it. I'll draw it away.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: It's only light that doesn't affect it.  Solid things, like rocks, can hurt it!  Fire above him!
What?: Move out of the way!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Get to the ship!
What?: Come back here... Where are you going?

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I don't pick up any life form concentration down there.  She'd better be right.
What?: They must be shielded somehow.  I'm sure the base is there.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You're a good pilot... I've learned a lot from you... I wish you...
What?: I know, but the chances for survival here just aren't great enough in my book.  I've got what I came for. Now I've got to get back to my ship.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I noticed you were having some problems, Blue Five... I thought I'd help.
What?: Thanks, old buddy.  I'll be with you in a second.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: A Wookiee broke loose up here, but we've subdued him... There is a lot of damage, and three, no four, casualties...
What?: We'll send a squad up.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: No need, everything's under control.
What?: With four casualties?!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: The... ah door's jammed.  Give us a few minutes to get it fixed.
What?: Who is this?  What's your operating...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Enough!  I already know about the data you've intercepted, but its' too late.  Whatever information you've gathered will be destroyed... You will come to know such suffering as only the Master of the Bogan Force can provide...
What?: You'll get no information from me. You have no authority... the council can't hold me!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: The 'Death Star' has become operational.  There is no force in the universe that can stop us now.
What?: They'll find its weakness.
It would be much easier if you were to tell us where the outposts are... Otherwise we'll be forced to destroy every suspicious system... What a waste...

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: What is it?  What's going on?  Where are we?
What?: You're safe.  We've come to get you out of here... Just relax.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I am Luke Starkiller at your service.
What?: There'll be time for that later. Now let's get out of here.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: Are there medical facilities on Yavin?
What?: He'll be well cared for.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: And you?
What?: I... I don't know.  I guess I never thought about it... I just want to help.  I want to be in on the attack. I want my own ship.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: First thing tomorrow morning you're going to check those condensing units on the south ridge.
What?: I will, but I'll have enough time to transmit my application first.

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: You'll check the condensing unit first... and you're not going to bed until those 'droids' are completely cleaned up...
What?: But you promised!  I've saved enough money and now you have the extra help ... you promised!

Don't you think it kind of defeats the: I said we'd see.  And as it is, I was forced to borrow your academy savings to buy the new 'droids.'  When you've saved it up again, I'll let you go.
